articles.title: UK coronavirus death toll reaches 14,500 after 850 more patients die - Birmingham Live
articles.description: As of 9am 17 April, 438,991 tests have concluded, with 21,328 tests on 16 April. 341,551 people have been tested of which 108,692 tested positive
articles.content:
A total of 14,576 patients have died in hospital after testing positive for coronavirus in the UK as of 5pm on Thursday, the Department of Health said, up by 847 from 13,729 the day before.
